comment:
* Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when an error
     * occurs while recording.

methods.name: void onError(MediaRecorder mr, int what, int extra)
methods.comment:
* Called when an error occurs while recording. * * @param mr the MediaRecorder that encountered the error * @param what the type of error that has occurred: *
    *
  • {@link #MEDIA_RECORDER_ERROR_UNKNOWN} *
  • {@link #MEDIA_ERROR_SERVER_DIED} *
* @param extra an extra code, specific to the error type

methodNames: void onError(MediaRecorder mr, int what, int extra)
